comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content:
Called so because it was designed to use natural daylight as illumination in the plant?

(And for a treat see page 14 of the same magazine -- an amazing piece of cultural history.)

comment.author: 37784107@N08
comment._content: Yes, exactly! :) An article about the Daylight Plant in the Norwester magazine describes it as "containing 33,000 square feet of Columbus sunshine and fresh air." Glad you're enjoying the collection!
